mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To contribute to our clients' global success by providing reliable, innovative, and sustainable solutions in international trade.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be a leading, reliable, and preferred business partner in global trade and manufacturing.

content.title: About Us
content.mainText: At Hefmac Global, we operate with a strong vision in international trade. Through our comprehensive services, we aim to be your solution partner across a wide range of needs, from automotive and industrial machinery spare parts to mechanical production, machining, and laser cutting. Additionally, our plastic mold and injection services provide high-quality solutions for various industry needs.
content.secondaryText: Our company guarantees the highest quality, efficiency, and timely delivery to create competitive advantages in the global market. With our professional logistics and customs services, we ensure the safe delivery of your products at every stage.
content.thirdText: Aligned with the evolving technology and market demands, we continue to grow and strengthen as an organization, aiming to provide high-quality products and services to our global customers. Through our innovative approach and strong network, we aim to overcome the challenges of international trade and consistently achieve the best results.
content.conclusion: At Hefmac Global, we strive to be one of the most reliable and sustainable business partners in our sector with our customer-oriented approach.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Providing services at the highest quality standards

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Continuous development and embracing technological innovations

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: Building reliable and transparent business relationships

hero.title: HEFMAC Global Logistics
hero.subtitle: Fast, Reliable, and Cost-Effective Logistics Services Worldwide
hero.description: HEFMAC Global provides end-to-end logistics solutions, including international transportation, customs procedures, and supply chain management. Trust our expertise for seamless global trade.

services.title: Comprehensive Logistics Services Tailored to Your Needs
services.description: We offer customized logistics solutions to optimize your supply chain and reduce costs, from international freight transport to warehousing and distribution services.

logistic.title: Logistics
logistic.description: Efficient and reliable logistics services across Europe and Asia.

mechanicalProduction.title: Mechanical Production and Industrial Processing Solutions
mechanicalProduction.description: Advanced production solutions for industrial excellence.

electronicProduction.title: Electronic Board Assembly and Manufacturing Services
electronicProduction.description: State-of-the-art technology for your electronic products.

mechanicalProduction.title: Mechanical Production and Industrial Processing Solutions
mechanicalProduction.subtitle: Advanced Production Solutions for Industrial Excellence
mechanicalProduction.description: HEFMAC GLOBAL is a manufacturing and supply company that provides services with high precision and quality standards in industrial production processes. We manufacture and process complex mechanical parts for the construction, automotive, defense, and white goods sectors.

electronicProduction.title: Electronic Board Assembly and Manufacturing Services
electronicProduction.subtitle: State-of-the-Art Technology for Your Electronic Products
electronicProduction.description: At HEFMAC GLOBAL, we meet the industry's highest standards with our IPC-standard-based assembly services for electronic board production. We offer flexible solutions for both mass production and small-batch needs, managing all processes from project initiation to final product with precision.

logisticsServices.title: Logistics Services
logisticsServices.description: We offer a strong service network in the fields of road transportation and maritime transportation from Europe to CIS countries and from CIS countries to European countries. We offer timely and reliable solutions to our customers with services such as complete and partial transportation, partial sea transportation, partial and FTL transportation to CIS countries and European countries. Our company also provides air transportation services to various countries. Our company supports you at every stage of the logistics processes with customs and storage services in Turkey.

cncMachining.title: CNC Vertical Machining & CNC Turning
cncMachining.description: CNC machining services with high precision and quality standards
features: Production with ±0.01 mm tolerance on 3, 4, and 5-axis CNC vertical machining centers
High-speed CNC turning for mass production metal processing
High-precision machining with aluminum, steel, stainless steel, brass, and composite materials

plasticInjection.title: Plastic Injection Molding
plasticInjection.description: Plastic injection mold design and production
features: Injection molding of high-strength technical plastics
Customized molding solutions for automotive and industrial plastic parts
Production with engineering plastics such as PP, ABS, POM, PC

laserCutting.title: Laser Cutting & Sheet Metal Bending
features: Fiber laser technology for metal cutting with ±0.05 mm precision
Sheet metal bending and forming operations with CNC press brakes
Superior surface quality with stainless steel, aluminum, galvanized steel, and other metals

specialProduction.title: Special Mechanical Production and Assembly
specialProduction.description: Custom production and prototype development services
features: Custom prototype production and low-volume series manufacturing
Welded manufacturing, surface treatments (coating, painting, anodizing, etc.)
Mechanical and electromechanical assembly services

mechanicalServices.subDescription: All our production processes are carried out in compliance with ISO 9001 quality management standards and are controlled with precise measurement equipment.
mechanicalServices.subDescription2: At HEFMAC GLOBAL, we provide the best solutions for your projects with our engineering-supported production approach. Contact us for more detailed information and quotes!

documentsReqirementAnalysis.title: Documentation and Requirements Analysis
documentsReqirementAnalysis.description: Analysis of the necessary documentation and requirements for electronic production
features: Analysis of schematic drawings, PCB layout files, and product specifications
Determination of optimal assembly and production strategies
Detailed analysis of production costs and processes

pcbLayout.title: PCB Layout Design and Assembly Process
pcbLayout.description: Electronic board assembly and layout design services
features: Compliance with IPC standards
Optimal component placement
Design rule check for design validation

tht.title: THT and SMD Component Assembly
tht.description: Surface mount and THT component assembly services
features: Using surface mount technology for component placement, maximizing production efficiency with compact design and high-density placement strategies
Providing high precision and optimization for traditional THT components to create reliable solder joints
Conformal coating applications

prodProcess.title: Production Process Management
prodProcess.description: Offering flexible production lines for both high-volume and low-volume custom production solutions
features: Mass production and small-batch production
Class 1, Class 2, Class 3 quality standards
International standard production and testing processes

electronicalServices.subDescription: At HEFMAC GLOBAL, we combine engineering and innovation in the electronic board assembly process to ensure the highest quality and performance standards for your projects.
electronicalServices.subDescription2: You can contact us for more information about your projects and technical requirements.
